**About me**

I'm a 4th year PhD student at the Sorbonne Institute of Development Studies (Université Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne), funded by the Telecom company Orange.

My research interests are in digital economics, with a particular focus on development economics. My thesis provides three impact evaluations of broadband internet deployment on various outcomes (political mobilization, house market, firms' choice of location...). My thesis advisors are [Mohamed Ali Marouani](https://sites.google.com/view/mohamedali-marouani/rieme-conference-paris) and [François Roubaud](https://leda.dauphine.fr/fr/membre/detail-cv/profile/francois-roubaud.html).

Thank you for visiting my website and learning more about my research interests. I look forward to sharing my findings with you in the future.
